divs: Sighting DetailsCan't recall what time it was exactly. I was driving from a client site on Research Dr. when I looked up and saw what appeared to be a large shard of metal in the sky. It was tilted at a 50-60 degree angle. Much more then a plane taking off. It kinda just appeared then got really reflective and faded away. I couldn't make out any windows and it was probably within 2-3 miles of my sight.
Summary: UFO Tilted Like A Shard of Metal Above Irvine
